parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets checked state of a [[CT_CHECKBOXES]] control.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> control '''ctrlSetChecked''' checked

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]] - [[CT_CHECKBOXES]] control. If control contain multiple checkboxes, only checkbox with index 0 is queried.

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> checked: [[Boolean]] - [[true]] to check, [[false]] to uncheck the checkbox

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name> s2</name>=<value>control '''ctrlSetChecked''' [index, checked] <template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.71.141591</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>y</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]] - [[CT_CHECKBOXES]] control

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value>  [index, checked]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> index: [[Number]] - checkbox index

</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> checked: [[Boolean]]- [[true]] to check, [[false]] to uncheck the checkbox

</value></part><part><name> r2</name>=<value>[[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_control [[ctrlSetChecked]] [[true]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_control [[ctrlSetChecked]] [3, [[true]]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ctrlChecked]], [[cbChecked]], [[cbSetChecked]]
</value></part></template></root>
